com.ac.games.rest.controller

Class CollectionController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ac.games.rest.controller.CollectionController

  • @RestController
@RequestMapping(value="/collection")
public class CollectionController
extends Object
    This class should be the intercepter for REST service access to the core Game information.

    It should handle all request that come in under the /game entry.

    Refer to the individual methods to determine the parameter lists.

    Author:
    ac010168

    • Method Detail

      • getCollection

        @RequestMapping(method=GET,
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object getCollection(@RequestParam(value="collectionid")
                                  long collectionID,
                                  @RequestParam(value="topx",defaultValue="-1")
                                  int topX,
                                  @RequestParam(value="compact",defaultValue="no")
                                  String compact)
        GET method designed to handle retrieving Collection data from the database. This method supports the following parameters:
        • collectionid=<collectionID>
        Parameters:
        collectionID -
        Returns:
        A Collection object or SimpleErrorData message reporting what failed.

      • putCollection

        @RequestMapping(method=PUT,
                consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8",
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object putCollection(@RequestParam(value="collectionid",defaultValue="-1")
                                  long collectionID,
                                  @RequestBody
                                  com.ac.games.data.Collection collection)
        A simple PUT command to update the user. This will update all fields for a collection, but the collectionID cannot be changed. This value must match the param collectionID.
        Parameters:
        collectionID - The collectionID we intend to update. This is required
        collection - The collection data we want to update. This is required.
        Returns:
        a SimpleMessageData indicating the operation succeeded, or a SimpleErrorData indicating it failed.

      • postCollection

        @RequestMapping(method=POST,
                consumes="application/json;charset=UTF-8",
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object postCollection(@RequestBody
                                   com.ac.games.data.Collection collection)
        A simple POST command to update the user. This will insert a new collection.
        Parameters:
        collection - The collection data we want to insert. This is required.
        Returns:
        a SimpleMessageData indicating the operation succeeded, or a SimpleErrorData indicating it failed.

      • deleteCollection

        @RequestMapping(method=DELETE,
                produces="application/json;charset=UTF-8")
public Object deleteCollection(@RequestParam(value="collectionid",defaultValue="-1")
                                     long collectionID)
        DELETE Method, which should delete the provided collection reference, if it exists
        Parameters:
        collectionID -
        Returns:
        A SimpleMessageData or SimpleErrorData message indicating the operation status
